'''Catalyst Conversion''' is [[Sucrose]]'s [[1st Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*This buff does '''not''' affect Anemo characters.
*The secondary element can be of any source, like explosive barrels or burning grass.
*Effects of different elements do '''not''' conflict and can therefore be active simultaneously.
**For example: {{Hydro}} → Swirl → {{Pyro}} → Swirl will buff {{Hydro}} and {{Pyro}} characters.
**The buff's duration is independent when several are active.
*This buff does not stack for the same secondary element. Instead, triggering a Swirl with the secondary element of an active buff will cause it to '''reset''' its duration.
